venue.address_1: Intersection of Lake St. & Amy Drive
venue.name: Risley Pond

item.description: Short Hike at Risley Pond, Lake Street, Vernon, led by Susan Barlow & Cynthia Barlow for the Manchester Land Conservation Trust on Saturday, January 17 at 1 p.m., at Risley Park, the Trust's largest parcel of protected land. Join us for a 1-hour walk around the pond. The terrain is rocky and sometimes wet, so hikers should wear sturdy shoes or boots. Participants should park in the Lake Street lot across from Amy Drive on the north side of Risley Pond; parking is also available along Amy Drive. Extreme weather cancels. Susan Barlow's home phone 860-643-9776. Hike is free. www.manchesterlandtrust.org. The photo is a July hike at Risley Pond.
